headline: Week’s Best: Advisors Reject LPL-Ameriprise Settlement
summary: A group of financial advisors says it has been unfairly caught up in a legal battle between  LPL Financial  and  Ameriprise  Financial, their current and former firms.  In December, the companies reached an agreement that required the advisors to turn over personal devices to a third-party examiner who could then delete any client information that Ameriprise claims they shouldn’t have had.  Although some Wall Street companies are sprinting to offer more alternative investment products to clients, Schwab set a high bar for retail investors to use its alts platform.
